amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of amendments Nos. 33, 36, 65, 66, 75, 85, 89, 93, 98, 100, 104, 124, 127, and 128 contained in House Report 112-485 and printed on pages H3026-H3030 of the Congressional Record for May 17, 2012.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc, comprised of the following amendments: Amendments Nos. 33, 36, 65, 66, 75, 85, 89, 93, 98, 100, 104, 124, 127, and 128 printed in House Report 112-485.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A013) offered by Mr. McKeon.
On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
